There are a lot of things changing in my private recovery and I am adapting.

See you soon.

text: @general

Het is zover, Qwobble is live in bèta!

Een jaar geleden begonnen we met een missie om kennis voor iedereen op het juiste moment toegankelijk te maken. Voor mensen uit de creative tech is dat vanaf nu mogelijk. Deel je kennis en ontwikkel je skills in de Qwobble community!

De eerste Qwobble voerden we zelf al uit. Zoom-Media (<http://www.zoom-media.nl|www.zoom-media.nl>) vroeg Rachid namelijk om een frisse blik te geven op de UX van hun demo omgeving.

Wij werken ondertussen verder aan onze droom om de Qwobble mindset te verspreiden.  Wil jij ook mee doen? Stuur me dan een berichtje!
<@U0D6EPESC> uploaded a file: <https://offcourse.slack.com/files/U0D6EPESC/F9237CBM5/.png|Slack for iOS Upload>

Congratulations with the sign ups!

I do not come today!
We have 2 new sign ups since Sunday according to MailChimp! <!channel>
No problem for me <@U78C4L1FZ>!

Hi there,

The fact that I am still wide awake at almost 3 o cock in the morning could mean that I don’t make it tomorrow or only a short time.

I expected myself to be at 42 around 13:00 and it’s possible that I won’t live up to them so I lower them now by sending this message.

Awkward or not awkward? 

It helps :upside_down_face:
Welcome <@U90NFQ7PG>
Welcome <@U901Z63KN>
Welcome <@U901Z63KN>! :tada:
Will do <@U0D6EPESC> !
I don't want to do it myself, because I don't know exactly what you have agreed upon.
I suggest something like this: Thanks for you feedback. Offcourse is currently still under construction. To get an overview of the supported browsers and features, please check our FAQ (+link)
<!channel> could someone of the support team reply to the LinkedIn comment above? In English, and simply be pointing to the FAQ... <@U8AM0S37E> <@U177W7XH8>
<https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:article:7154632159890621276?commentUrn=urn%3Ali%3Acomment%3A%28article%3A7154632159890621276%2C6363659012206063616%29>
Welcome <@U901Z63KN>! Great to have you involved

Hi <!everyone>, I just joined the offcourse community slack. I'm partly responsible for building the new marketing website for offcourse. A really exciting project mainly because we expect it to be a major traffic driver for the platform. 

A little bit about myself. I'm a software developer, entrepreneur, surfer, music lover and webdesigner from Rotterdam. I'm building a startup and I do freelance dev and webdesign work (React, Meteor, Node). 

Very excited to be a part of this community and I'm looking forward on meeting you all and on making a positive impact together!
<@U901Z63KN> has joined the channel
Crowdlearning in Africa with Microsoft
<@U90NFQ7PG> has joined the channel
<@U3MRJ1CDN> uploaded a file: <https://offcourse.slack.com/files/U3MRJ1CDN/F90Q7SSRM/image_uploaded_from_ios.png|Image uploaded from iOS>
<@U177W7XH8> I'm off to bed now. Week was way too long already :wink:
<@U177W7XH8> versioning them (more ore less). No worries, it's done now!

<@U177W7XH8> <@U8AM0S37E> you can talk about pop ups poll, but I want to chime in before we make any decisions. I'll only consider it, if it's part of a larger well thought out strategy. Getting actionable feedback from questionaires is hard, and it's easy to do wrong (and actually do harm). Please consult <@U0ARRNM3R> as well before moving forward. She knows quite a lot about this topic. Also, it should not take too much of your and especially <@U8AM0S37E>'s time. We have a lot of things that are more urgent for the moment.
what does 'tag releases' mean?
<@U177W7XH8>. My fault. Forgot that I need to tag releases before they are pushed. Done it. Should push it to the site as we speak.
weird.. there's not GTM script in the S3 link at all
... without the /flags/all
<http://offcourse-about.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/flags/all>
@sander depends... Reset your cache. Check the direct link on s3. See if that works already.
Yes I realized that too late, I'll look into the proper etiquette in the coming week :nerd_face: How long does it take to the CDN to update usually? It's taking more than 2 hours already..

<@U177W7XH8> awesome work!!! Since you are an owner now, you already pushed the new version live yourself. No need for me to fix anything. Should work once the CDN has updated. In the future, let's use proper git etiquette and not push things straight to the master branch. Is that okay?

- I integrated Google Analytics and Hotjar on our website. Enabled heatmaps and recordings. We can track users on the platform now, not only where they're from but also where they click, scroll, etc. I blocked the IP address of 42workspace in Hotjar so that our own activity isn't recorded. Also made sure users IP addresses are anonymized, because otherwise we have to display a cookie pop up (Dutch privacy law).

- There's also an option in Hotjar for pop up polls (as well as forms and surveys), to ask users for feedback. I think this could be a very effective way to ask users for feedback, as it's much more user friendly than Google Docs. Maybe we can discuss this <@U8AM0S37E> oncoming Tuesday?

- I implemented the Analytics on the platform, but for the landing page I had to edit the user ID in Gitlab.. I pushed and merged, but on the landing page it still shows the old one.. (<https://gitlab.com/offcourse/landing-page/commit/ce506e0ec1d6a6a6fc11d7390fb791da1ff1e19f>) <@U0D6EPESC> Can you please fix this before your vacation? This is helpful to see how many people make the conversion of page visit to signup or joining mailing list.

- Also installed Google Search Console so that our website is being indexed (asked for new index of URLs and pages). But we need to put metas on the website first + sitemap for this to be effective.. Now it's a bit useless. I assume <@U8DQWL9EK> and <@U0D6EPESC> discussed this with martijn and joris today??

- <@U0D6EPESC>, thought about it and I agree to leave Mixpanel for now. It's better to implement this in a later stage. Besides, Google Analytics has a lot of new features since I checked last time.. and Mixpanel only keeps data for max 60 days in its free version.. So I don't really think we need it anymore.

-Going home now :skull:
<@U0D6EPESC> You seem as happy as Dolly is in your profile picture :wink::panda_face:

<https://www.hotjar.com>
Eliminate guesswork with recordings of real visitor behavior on your site. By seeing your visitor's clicks, taps and mouse movements you can identify usability issues on the fly.

attachments.title: Hotjar - Heatmaps, Visitor Recordings, Conversion Funnels, Form Analytics, Feedback Polls and Surveys in One Platform
attachments.text: See how visitors are really using your website, collect user feedback and turn more visitors into customers.

That’s the day when I met JH + Dolly for the first time.

It’s a symbolic date for me. I  stared to listen to my gut feeling the day before and tuned down an opportunity for job reintegration the day before.
